Name:
USS Hova (DE-110)
Hova (F-704)
Hova (F-704)
Fate:
Transferred to Free France, 18 March 1944
Scrapped
Stricken:
14 May 1952
Returned to the US Navy May 1964
Displacement:
1,240 long tons (1,260 t) standard
1,620 long tons (1,646 t) full
Propulsion: 4 × GM Mod. 16-278A diesel engines with electric drive, 6,000 shp (4,474 kW), 2 screws
Armament:
3 × single Mk.22 3"/50 caliber guns
1 × twin 40 mm Mk.1 AA gun
8 × 20 mm Mk.4 AA guns
3 × 21-inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
1 × Hedgehog Mk.10 anti-submarine mortar
8 × Mk.6 depth charge projectors
2 × Mk.9 depth charge tracks
